items.title: Ambushed in Mexico, Mormon Children Tried to Save One Another
items.previewText: Children bore the brunt of a deadly shooting in Mexico. But some of them survived, and endured harrowing journeys to get help.

items.title: Die Selbstzerstörung der Thüringer CDU
items.previewText: CDU-Fraktionschef Mike Mohring sendet in Thüringen widersprüchliche Signale in Richtung AfD. Ist das nur Führungsversagen oder steckt dahinter eine Strategie?

items.title: A Physics Magic Trick: Take 2 Sheets of Carbon and Twist
items.previewText: The study of graphene was starting to go out of style, but new experiments with sheets of the ultrathin material revealed there was much left to learn.
